thread.section_title: Grooves.land Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Grooves.land | grooves-inc.de
thread.title: philip hatfield

author: philip hatfield
title: philip hatfield
text: The only place on the planet (apparently) where I could purchase a region B Blu Ray version of the Anthony Hopkins film, The Edge (Auf Messers Schneide-Rivalen) after mistakenly buying a region A version which won't play in Europe, from Amazon. Not only that but THREE discs including Soundtrack and all arrived within one week from Germany to the UK. Couldn't be happier!!!
